B

BadConnectionDataException - Exception in fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions
The exception BadConnectionDataException is thrown when the data identifying the connection to a RMI registry is incorrect.
BadConnectionDataException() - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions.BadConnectionDataException
creating a bad data connection exception.
BadConnectionDataException(String) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions.BadConnectionDataException
creating a bad data connection exception.
BadConnectionDataException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions.BadConnectionDataException
creating a bad data connection exception.
BadConnectionDataException(String, Throwable, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions.BadConnectionDataException
creating a bad data connection exception.
BadConnectionDataException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.exceptions.BadConnectionDataException
creating a bad data connection exception.

BCMException - Exception in fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions
The class BCMException defines the most general exception thrown within BCM; other BCM specific exceptions inherit from this exception.
BCMException() - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.BCMException
 
BCMException(String) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.BCMException
 
BCMException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.BCMException
 
BCMException(String, Throwable, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.BCMException
 
BCMException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception fr.sorbonne_u.components.exceptions.BCMException
